resources.string:
About DeepTraffic

This app is a part of a school project. The project\'s goal is to get familiar with machine learning, Tensorflow and Android. In the first phase of the project several neural networks were trained to recognize traffic signs. This app leverages these models to classify photographs.

How to use

Models

  •   Convolution - network with two convolution + pooling layers and two fully-connected layers
  •   Simple - simple network with three fully-connected layers
  •   MobileNetV2 - retrained Tensorflow Hub module, originally trained on ImageNet
